mobileinfo.maininfo:
How to enable WAP-functions in EPiServer

Since the wap/mobile device support in EPiServer is based on the Microsoft Mobile Internet Toolkit it is not enabled by default. If you want to activate the mobile device support, follow the instructions below.

  • Download and install the Microsoft Mobile Internet Toolkit on your development machine. It can be downloaded from http://www.msdn.microsoft.com
  • Go to EPiServers Admin-mode and open the page type definition for Mobile page
    • Enter Settings for this page type.
    • Change "Filename" to point to templates/Mobile.aspx instead of templates/MobileInfo.aspx
    • Save changes.
  • Add a reference to System.Web.Mobile (installed with the Mobile Internet Toolkit) to your EPiServer devlopment project.
  • Include the file /templates/Mobile.aspx in your EPiServer development project.
  • Recompile your EPiServer project.

form.requirelogon: This form requires that you have logged on.
form.denymultipleposts: You have already answered this form.

register.invalidemail: Please enter a valid email address so we can process your application.
register.invalidpassword: You have to enter a password. Enter the same password in the two text fields.
register.expiredidentity: Your user information has expired, please log on again.
register.usernotsaved: the user could not be saved, please try another username.
register.errorwhilesavinguser: An error occured, user has not been saved.
register.invalidsettings: All settings for extranet users has not been set.
register.applyemailsubject: A new user has asked for membership.
register.applyemailbodyprefix: Go to this page to activate the user:
register.usersaved: You will receive an email as soon as your application has been approved and activated.
register.usersavedandactivated: You can now log on to the website.

page.notproperlyconfigured: Quicksearch isn't properly configured. (Dynamic propterty "Global search page" must have been defined)

search.nomatches: No matches found, please try again.
search.help:
Search hints!
  • Enter up to 10 words separated with space, for example word1 word2 word33
  • Restrict the search by placing a plus sign (+) in front of the words that must be found to consider the page a match, for example +word1 +word2 +word3
  • Restrict the search by placing a minus sign (-) in front of the words that must not occur to consider the page a match, for example +word1 +word2 -word3
  • If "Match whole word" is selected but you still want to match part of a word, place an asterisk(*) at the end of the rod, for example word1* word2 which will match "word123 ord2" but not "word123 word234"
search.indexservererror: The index engine is not running at the moment and searches against files and documents cannot be done.

login.persistentlogin: Enable automatic logon to this web site

notimplemented.notimplemented: This feature is not available yet

register.notallowed: This site does not allow user registration.

property.help: Enter the text that will be the message body above the list of modified pages sent in the subscription mail.

property.help: Select a startingpoint for the suncription. A link to each page changed or added below this point in the tree will be sent in the subscription mail.

property.name: MainContainer

property.help: If this field is left empty, the search will start from the start page
